title: To the rescue
brief_description: Air Ambulance: Saskatchewan’s air ambulance service brings quick relief to the sick or injured. Rocky Mountain Rescue: Rescue techniques used by park wardens and the Royal Canadian Mounted Police to aid stranded or injured mountain climbers are demonstrated. Avalanche Experts: In the Canadian Rockies the experts often anticipate and prevent avalanches.
